name: Alchemist (itch) (Feather Chung)
description:
This is a unfinished game I made by my own in about 1 week in January, 2019.

-------

How to play :

1. Hold left button of your mouse to charge.

按住滑鼠左鍵蓄力。

2. Fill your bottle grenade(the square at the bottom left) to achieve the percentage interval required, and release the mouse button.

( The requirement is shown at the top of the square, you have to determine when to release.)

為你的火藥瓶(左下角的方形)充能，並等待適當的時機放開左鍵，充能的百分比必須在每一回合要求的區間內，有效區間會顯示在方形的上方。

3. Kill the monster with a perfect one shot!

擲出帥氣的一擊，秒殺敵人！

-------

You are an alchemist that run into a dangerous dungeon with your Bottle Grenade made of magic materials. It is a powerful weapon, however, you need to charge to a certain percentage interval in order to deal effective damage, this percentage interval will change every round, depending on temperature and humidity ( and randomness of code, maybe.) The acceptable percentage interval will be shown at the bottom left.

You have only 3 chances, try to make the score as high as possible!
